attributes.action: Award the community of Wooton Basset an honour in recognition of their untiring support and dedication to the homecoming of British troops killed in action in the ongoing conflict in Afghanistan.  They have without fail made personal sacrifices in all weathers and conditions in order to give our brave serviceman a return to the UK which reflects the sentiment and appreciation of the large majority of the British population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
